pr_title: [TE] anomaly search - hide child anomaly unless queried with anomaly ids

timeline.bodyText: Hi Jihao, is there a way for us to test the fix before waiting for the next deployment? This is a bit critical which is impacting all entity monitoring. Let's make sure it works when we deploy.
timeline.author: cecilynie

replies.bodyText: it will be tested by unit tests and staging before deploy.
replies.author: jihaozh
